reviews.customers_say: Customers love the kimono's unusual Victorian look with an edge and appreciate its sheer wash of dark blue green color.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars So luxurious and bono style
items.body: This is the second one I've bought and it didn't disappoint either. They are my favorite colors together! Not much wrinkle to them when they came or after wearing. The wrinkles fall right off after wearing (if there are any) So luxurious, very well made, great weight and perfect for my 2x size Read more
items.author: NancyG

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful jacket. One of my favorites!
items.body: I LOVE this jacket! I bought it to wear in my best friend's wedding. I was the officiant and needed a piece that stood out from the rest of the wedding party but still fit in. The bride chose the wine color from David's Bridal and this color matched it perfectly! I wear it all the time now and it's one of my favorite pieces. It's heavier than expected but I appreciate the quality of the fabrics used. It's sheer but the burnout design helps to provide nice coverage if you're self-conscious about any area it covers. It's not too revealing and I often wear it to work. It's very cool and not itchy. Very classy piece. Love it. Read more
items.author: Sarah

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful and Funky Glamor
items.body: Absolute stunner. So cute exactly as pictured! I’m thrilled with it and can’t wait to wear it to my son’s restaurant! Such a nice piece to make you feel gorgeous, funky, with a timeless bohemian flare you can dress up or down. Color looks like wine red and a muted jade green. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: LadyB

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very pretty wraps in many colors!
items.body: These kimono style wraps are really very pretty and stylish. A one-size-fits-all approach typical of the kimono style, they fit me just fine at a 3x size and would simply be fuller on a smaller frame. They will work for a lightweight wrap or a swim cover up. I ordered several colors until I found one that was the perfect shade. These aren't going to be cold weather wraps, but will provide a little protection in summer and warm spring or autumn days. The hand of the fabric is very soft and drapey. I haven't washed it yet, but it's an easy to care for material and it shouldn't be an issue at all. Read more
items.author: C. Knighton

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous
items.body: This is a beautiful shaw! The quality is amazing and the color was spot on. Read more
items.author: Marcie Smith

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Incredibly elegant and received many compliments
items.body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: I wore this with a black turtleneck and black slacks to the Metropolitan opera on a recent visit to NYC with my daughter. It was elegant and flowing and I felt beautiful. The lapel tends to twist a bit. I might add some bias tape next time I wear it to help it hold its shape but truly, that’s such a small thing compared to the visual impact it had. I absolutely recommend this… It is stunning! Read more
items.author: HennaPen

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good Dupe
items.body: Good quality, feels & looks like like Free People Read more
items.author: Cat

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars I wanted this for a while
items.body: I wanted this for a while and finally bought it. Very nice. Looks like a major brand that I love. Read more
items.author: IMO

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

For the best look, smooth the fabric, check the neckline placement, and pair it with shoes that match the occasion and the hem length.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black/Beige, Gold, (Lilac), Beige/Pink, Rusty/Olive, (Blue/Pink)…, (Martini), (Black 2), (Fuschia), Dark Green, Red, (Blue), (Navy), Moss-stone. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
